content:
I've converted the recycling value you collected
into a sweet candy figure as a thank-you gift!
What do you say, would you like to accept it?
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content: Yes! I want it!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
For every <color=#8AAB4B>2</color> pieces of driftwood,
I can recycle them and give you a reward in return.
So, come find me when you're ready.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Alright, let's see what we can salvage!
Let me calculate...
One tael, two taels...
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
As for what you'll get,
Little Sugar told me to—keep it a secret!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Hmm... before that,
let me look around here
for some candy art inspiration.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
It's because of my dedicated practice
that my sugar figurines look so lifelike,
not because I trapped real people inside them like some people think!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
So, would you like to save up some more?
The drifting items will be scattered along the shore with the currents.
If you can't find them, keep an eye out for unusual glimmers!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
*Ding!*
Have you collected enough drifting items for an exchange?
Or would you like to trade in your recyclables for a reward?
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content: Let me think about it.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Eh? Want to save up for a proper thank-you gift?
Don't worry, these turbulent times will continue for a while,
I'll be here waiting for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content: Submit these recyclables.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
*Ding*—
Let me think about it.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Oh, and don't worry too much about it,
the recycling value adds up over time,
I'll keep track of it for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Perfect! That's enough to exchange for a batch of recyclables!
And don't forget to come see me for your reward!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
<size=30>Besides,
it's not even that size...</size>
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Ah, since the little candy person was naturally formed,
the thank-you gifts inside
might also be naturally formed things~
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content:
Alright, looks like the turbulence will continue for a while.
There should be plenty more debris to collect,
I'll stay here and wait for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content: I want to thank you for the candy figure!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content: I'll save up some more.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提2_随机任务1

content: Well then, I'll leave this <color=#8AAB4B>candy craftsman's token of gratitude</color> with you!
